OPTION.NAME: -Su
OPTION.DESC: disable initialization of uninitialized static variables

OPTION.NAME: -idx
OPTION.DESC: index size in bytes (1 or 2) (default n=1)

OPTION.NAME: -16x
OPTION.DESC: use PIC16 extended instructions (PIC16F193x and alike, default off)

OPTION.NAME: -o
OPTION.DESC: name specify name for generated object file

OPTION.NAME: -beep
OPTION.DESC: issue sound at the end of compilation (default off)

PARAM.DESC: pattern matching and bank switching optimization on

OPTION.NAME: -p
OPTION.DESC: name project (output) name for multiple .obj file linking

OPTION.NAME: -rb
OPTION.DESC: address ROM base (start) address to use

OPTION.NAME: -rt
OPTION.DESC: address ROM top (end) address to use

OPTION.NAME: -swcs
OPTION.DESC: s1 s2 s3 use software call stack. Hardware stack is allocated by specifying stack depths s1,s2,s3 - these are optional s1 = main and task routines hardware stack allocation s2 = ISR hardware stack allocation s3 = PIC18 low priority ISR hardware stack allocation

OPTION.NAME: -isrnoshadow
OPTION.DESC: ISR No use of Shadow registers

OPTION.NAME: -isrnocontext
OPTION.DESC: ISR No context Save/restore is added to ISR(PIC18 only)

OPTION.NAME: -icd2
OPTION.DESC: add NOP at first ROM address for correct ICD2 operation

OPTION.NAME: -hexela
OPTION.DESC: always add extended linear address record to .hex file

OPTION.NAME: -beep
OPTION.DESC: issue sound at the end of link (default off)

OPTION.NAME: -idx
OPTION.DESC: num array index size in bytes (num=1 or num=2, default num=1)

OPTION.NAME: -lib
OPTION.DESC: make library file from supplied .obj and .lib files
